Key Match Events: Kohli scored an unbeaten 103 off 97 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the win and the team's performance
Najmul Hossain Shanto admitted Bangladesh did not play their best game
Virat Kohli highlighted the importance of maintaining momentum in the team and the atmosphere in the changing room
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hardik Pandya suffered an ankle injury during the match
The crowd showed appreciation for Kohli's century
